## Pages

### Home
https://example.com
Experience modern gaming with integrated proxy functionality for uninterrupted play. Wayne County Education delivers simple, accessible games designed for everyone.

### Games
https://example.com/games
Discover our full collection of modern, streamlined games built for easy access. From classics to new favorites, find your next gaming adventure here.

### Proxy
https://example.com/proxy
Access games anywhere with our built-in proxy functionality. Enjoy uninterrupted gaming with seamless connectivity and enhanced accessibility features.

### Contact
https://example.com/contact
Have questions or suggestions? Connect with our team for gaming support, technical help, or feature requests. We&#39;re here to enhance your experience.
